thread.title: Free Deal of the Week: Microsoft Office 2013 Free Reference Card Kit
thread.title_full: Free Deal of the Week: Microsoft Office 2013 Free Reference Card Kit

author: Martin Brinkmann
title: Free Deal of the Week: Microsoft Office 2013 Free Reference Card Kit
text:
Free Deal of the Week: Microsoft Office 2013 Free Reference Card Kit By Martin Brinkmann on September 25, 2015 in Deals - Last Update: September 25, 2015 0 
This week's free deal brings you a set of six individual reference cards (cheat sheets) for six Microsoft Office applications. 
The included applications are Microsoft Excel 2013, Microsoft Word 2013, Microsoft PowerPoint 2013, Microsoft Outlook 2013, Microsoft Project 2013 and Microsoft SharePoint Foundation 2013. 
The PDF document has been designed for printing. Each page is packed with useful information that include important shortcuts, core operations and how to perform them as well as editing, formatting and application specific tips. 
The overall layout and design of each sheet is excellent and since it is two sheets per application, you may put them on a single printout to have them both ready when you need them. Click here to visit the Microsoft Office 2013 Free Reference Card Kit deals page Most of these tips should work in the new Office 2016 as well. Check out the main Deals page for additional technical document downloads and magazines that you may be of interest to you. Please note that you need an email address for the deal and will be asked to fill out a short survey before downloads becomes available. Please share this article About Martin Brinkmann Martin Brinkmann is a journalist from Germany who founded Ghacks Technology News Back in 2005. He is passionate about all things tech and knows the Internet and computers like the back of his hand. You can follow Martin on Facebook , Twitter or Google+
